Package org.apache.sling.scripting.sightly.impl.filter

Class URIManipulationFilter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.sling.scripting.sightly.impl.filter.AbstractFilter
org.apache.sling.scripting.sightly.impl.filter.URIManipulationFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Filter>, Filter
public class URIManipulationFilter extends AbstractFilter
The URIManipulationFilter provides support for Sightly's URI Manipulation options according to the language specification
